fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: In this national election, did parties or candidates receive either free or publicly financed access to national broadcast media?

fxInfo_responses.value: Either no parties or only the governing party receives free access.
Some parties in addition to the governing party receive free access.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2elfrcamp, *_osp, *_ord
